#summary How to check out this project.

= Introduction =

Tips in order not to checkout the whole project.

= SVN =

See
[http://code.google.com/p/alban/source/checkout Source]

{{{
svn co https://alban.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ . --depth empty
svn up env
svn up .vnc
svn up .bashrc
svn up .cshrc
svn up .subversion
}}}
